mapper.insert: insert into sys_decision_transition_snapshot (id, decision, decision_model, transition, name, code, content, rule_set_snapshot, desc, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decisionModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleSetSnapshot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_decision_transition_snapshot set decision = #{decision,jdbcType=INTEGER}, decision_model = #{decisionModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transition = #{transition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_set_snapshot = #{ruleSetSnapshot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, decision, decision_model, transition, name, code, content, rule_set_snapshot, desc, createTime from sys_decision_transition_snapshot where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
